title: What are the different methods for taking a screenshot?
answer:
There are two normal methods for taking a screenshot. 

 Take a screenshot using the buttons on the outside of your phone: When not in standby, go to the screen of which you want to take a screenshot. Simultaneously press the volume down button and the power button for 2 seconds and a screenshot will be taken. 

 Take a screenshot using your phone's software: When not in standby, go to the screen of which you want to take a screenshot. Swipe down on the status bar and choose the screenshot icon to take a screenshot.
